mapper.insert: insert into login_info(id,login_times,last_date,type, now_date) values(#{id},1,#{date},#{type},#{date}) on duplicate key update login_times=login_times+1, last_date=now_date, now_date=#{date}

choose.otherwise: select info.*, emp.account as name from login_info as info left join employees as emp on info.id=emp.id where info.id=#{id} and info.type=#{type} union select info.*, tu.nick_name as name from login_info as info left join users as tu on tu.id=info.id where info.id=#{id} and info.type=#{type}

mapper.select: select info.*, emp.account as name from login_info as info left join employees as emp on info.id=emp.id where info.type='1' union select info.*, tu.nick_name as name from login_info as info left join users as tu on tu.id=info.id where info.type='0';
